summary: This document contains financial information related to the partnership MIDWAY VISTA PARK, LLC for the tax year 2012. It includes details on partner shares of income, deductions, and credits, as well as specific tax-related information for partners involved, particularly BLUE CHIP CAPITAL, LLC. The document is significant for understanding the financial dealings and tax obligations of the partnership during that year.

keyFacts: The document is a Schedule K-1 for the partnership MIDWAY VISTA PARK, LLC for the tax year 2012.
BLUE CHIP CAPITAL, LLC is identified as a partner in MIDWAY VISTA PARK, LLC.
The partnership reported a net rental real estate income loss of -4,681.
The document includes details on non-deductible expenses and partner's share of income, deductions, and credits.
The tax year for the partnership runs from September 7, 2012, to December 31, 2012.
